definitions.text: an area that includes places where several people can sit
examples: there is seating for 40 students in this classroom

definitions.text: the service of ushering people to their seats
show to a seat; assign a seat for
examples: The host seated me next to Mrs. Smith

definitions.text: place ceremoniously or formally in an office or position
examples: there was a ceremony to induct the president of the Academy

definitions.text: put a seat on a chair
place or attach firmly in or on a base
examples: seat the camera on the tripod

definitions.text: place in or on a seat
examples: the mother seated the toddler on the high chair
